landlord.question: What type of properties do we take on?
landlord.answer: We specialised in House of Multiple Occupancies: HMO

landlord.question: How quick is the process?
landlord.answer: If your property is licensed, compliant, and in good shape, then it could be up and running in just few weeks.

landlord.question: How do I get paid?
landlord.answer: We will deposit the agreed amount into your account on the same date each month.

landlord.question: Does my property need to be furnished?
landlord.answer: We are happy to work with both furnished and unfurnished properties. In addition, we provide a refurbishment service to keep your property to a high standard. All these options are work out in our deals.

landlord.question: How will I know if my property is kept in good condition?
landlord.answer: We thrive to keep high standards, and therefore we will make regular visit to the property, and we will keep you updated.

tenant.question: Do I need to pay a deposit?
tenant.answer: Yes, usually a deposit equivalent of 1 month rent would be needed.

tenant.question: How quickly can I rent my new room?
tenant.answer: After completing all our checks, moving in can take only a few days.

tenant.question: Do I need to pay any fees?
tenant.answer: No, you wonâ€™t be charged any fees.
